sen.j: 武勇の誉れ高く、常勝の武将として「平不負」と俗称した。
sen.e: Kunitae was highly respected for his military prowess, popularly known as the 'Invincible Taira' for being the ever victorious busho.

sen.j: 天喜5年(1057年)、黄海合戦に於いて源頼義軍に属し先陣を担っていたが乗馬が流れ矢で倒された為、安倍軍の捕虜となった。
sen.e: In 1507, having joined the army of MINAMOTO no Yoriyoshi in the Battle of Yellow Sea, Kunitae was leading the van of Yoriyoshi's army but as his horse fell, shot by a stray arrow, he was captured by the Abe's troops.

sen.j: 本来処刑される所であったが、安倍方の将藤原経清が、国妙の外甥であった為に助命嘆願し死を免れた。
sen.e: Under ordinary circumstances, he was supposed to be executed but FUJIWARA no Tsunekiyo, the warrior in the Abe's army and who was also the nephew of Kunitae, begged for mercy, sparing his life.
Under ordinary circumstances, he was supposed to be executed but FUJIWARA no Tsunekiyo, who was a warrior of the Abe's army and was a nephew of Kunitae, begged for his life and he was saved.
sen.cmt: 藤原経清の説明をまとめ、「死を免れた」が訳抜けだったので加えました。

sen.j: なお、寛治7年（1093年）、平師妙・平師季親子が出羽国司源信明の館を攻め、翌嘉保元年（1094年）、陸奥国守源義綱の郎党により鎮圧された。
sen.e: In 1093, TAIRA no Morotae and his son TAIRA no Morosue attacked the house of the governor of Dewa Province MINAMOTO no Saneakira but, in 1094, the following year, were put down by retainers of the governor of Mutsu Province MINAMOTO no Yoshitsuna.

sen.j: だが、『中右記』によると、前年の寛治6年（1092年）6月には陸奥国国司藤原基家 (陸奥守)の解文により、経清の子藤原清衡に合戦の企ての嫌疑がかけられていることから、両者を関連づけ、この師妙親子を清衡の大伯叔父である国妙の子及び孫ではないかとする見解がある。
sen.e: According to Chuyuki (a diary written by FUJIWARA no Munetada), however, based on the letter written by FUJIWARA no Motoie (Mutsu no kami (the governor of Mutsu Province), the officer of local government in Mutsu Province, Tsunekiyo's son FUJIWARA no Kiyohira was under suspicion for attempting to launch a battle and, consequently, an association was made between those 2 parties and there is an opinion suggesting that Morotae and his son were actually the child and grandchild of Kunitae who was the great uncle of Kiyohira.
sen.cmt: 「両者を関連づけ」－原文からはこの「両者」が誰と誰であるのか確認不明ですので、単に ‘those 2 parties’としておきました。一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: According to "Chuyuki" (a diary written by FUJIWARA no Munetada), however, the letter written by FUJIWARA no Motoie (Mutsu no kami), an officer of local government in Mutsu Province, said the fact that Tsunekiyo's son FUJIWARA no Kiyohira was under suspicion for attempting to launch a battle in June 1092, the previous year of TAIRA no Mototae's attack, and consequently, there is a view that they were related and Morotae and his son might be the child and grandchild of TAIRA no Kunitae, who was the great uncle of Kiyohira.
sen.cmt: 『中右記』→ダブルクォーテション・マークを加え、「前年の1092年6月」の部分が訳抜けだったので加えました。「見解」をopinionからviewに変えました。
